channel.title: Editing .dat files
channel.description: In the new 508 cache, there are .dat files. ex. the character files. I can edit them with notepad to make them the way i want them, but once they get put to use.. ex2. Logging into the server. They immidiately change back. What can i do to prevent this? I've tried making them read only to see if my character would log in with it's new items ect. But it just logs in as normal, just doesn't save. Help please?

item.title: Editing .dat files
item.dc:creator: @crom170 crom170
item.description:
@crom170 wrote:

if u host a server thru hamachi and u update client, then u need to reuploade the client ea time the server is hosted from you computer so you dont need to “update” the server

Read full topic

item.title: Editing .dat files
item.dc:creator: @jimmyjtomson jimmyjtomson
item.description:
@jimmyjtomson wrote:

I’ve tried to edit with .txt, haven’t tried java yet. My editers for java are on server. I’m kinda paranoid to mess with that lately. Been crashing alot. Have some software faults. They edit fine, but… like i said. They wont stay. Once i log on it resets them back to what they were.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing .dat files
item.dc:creator: @jimmyjtomson jimmyjtomson
item.description:
@jimmyjtomson wrote:

In the new 508 cache, there are .dat files. ex. the character files. I can edit them with notepad to make them the way i want them, but once they get put to use… ex2. Logging into the server. They immidiately change back. What can i do to prevent this? I’ve tried making them read only to see if my character would log in with it’s new items ect. But it just logs in as normal, just doesn’t save. Help please?

Read full topic
